resources.string:
Our Beliefs
 We believe 
 1.In the unity of the Father, the Son and the Holy Spirit in the Godhead 
 2.The incarnation, sinless life, atoning death, bodily resurrection, ascension to the right hand of the Father and the personal return in glory of Jesus Christ
 3.The agency of the Holy Spirit in the conversion of sinners, the sanctification of believers, and the ministry of the Church
 4.The universal sinfulness and guilt of man, and that salvation is only by the Grace of God through repentance from sin and faith in Jesus Christ.
 5.The Bible as an inspired inerrant word of God, authoritative inall matters of faith and practice for the believers
 6.The priesthood of the believers

A community of transformed persons connected through small groups and courageous witnesses of Christ in every sphere of society\n
Loving God, Connecting with People, Transforming Communities.
Not a member? Sign up now.
